getFixedRecommender


public static org.apache.mahout.cf.taste.recommender.Recommender getFixedRecommender(float rat)
This method creates a recommender which always return the same estimated preference. It could be useful in order to generate dummy wrapping recommenders.

Parameters:
rat - value of the fixed preference to be estimated by the recommender
Returns:
a recommender which always estimate the same preference
See Also:
Recommender, TrecRecommenderEvaluator.setWrappingRecommender(Recommender)

getRecommenderFromResult


public static org.apache.mahout.cf.taste.recommender.Recommender getRecommenderFromResult(PersistentRecommender result)
This method creates a recommender from an object which already contains some pre-generated preferences for (every) pair of user and item.

Parameters:
result - object encoding already generated preference estimations
Returns:
a recommender which returns the information encoded in result

getCompleteDataset


public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Float>> getCompleteDataset(java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Float>> training,

                                                                                                             java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Float>> test)
This methods allows to obtain the complete dataset from a training-test split

Parameters:
training - one of the data splits
test - another data splits
Returns:
a restored version of the data, based on the two splits given
